content.1: And it came to pass, that after the year was expired, at the time that kings go out
content.2: And David took the crown of their king from off his head, and found it to weigh a talent of gold, and
content.3: And he brought out the people that
content.4: And it came to pass after this, that there arose war at Gezer with the Philistines; at which time Sibbechai the Hushathite slew Sippai,
content.5: And there was war again with the Philistines; and Elhanan the son of Jair slew Lahmi the brother of Goliath the Gittite, whose spear staff
content.6: And yet again there was war at Gath, where was a man of
content.7: But when he defied Israel, Jonathan the son of Shimea David’s brother slew him.
content.8: These were born unto the giant in Gath; and they fell by the hand of David, and by the hand of his servants.
